definitions.example: He does woodwork as a hobby.

definitions.definition: (only in plural, often in proper names) A workshop or factory devoted to making wood products.
A place of concealment or obscurity.
definitions.example: Friends and relatives were coming out of the woodwork to celebrate his good fortune.

definitions.definition: The frame of the goal, i.e. the goalpost or crossbar.
definitions.example: That goal was so close, it went in off the woodwork.
